channel.title: Power Gamers on Alon Talmi's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Power Gamers on Alon Talmi's Portfolio

item.title: Spacetaurant
item.description: --- About the game Spacetaurant is a mobile, casual idle, sandbox-y game about running a futuristic and cute restaurant on a intergalactic highway. You play as the owner of the restaurant, you need to collect and grow ingredients and make sure all your customers leave your restaurant satisfied and hopefully leave you a good review. Spacetaurant was part of R2G - a game development acceleration program.
